author: Stephen Totilo
title: Portable PC gaming's moment arrives with Valve's Steam Deck
description: Valve hopes Steam Deck can make portable high-end PC gaming a lasting thing.
content:
One of PC gamings top companies is making one of its biggest bets with todays launch of the Steam Deck.
Why it matters: Valve hopes Steam Deck can make portable high-end PC gaming a lasting thing.
